verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּר֙ <WH1696> spake יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> that Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1263> unto Baruch בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son נֵֽרִיָּ֑ה <WH5374> of Neriah בְּכָתְבוֹ֩ <WH3789> when he had written אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֨ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> these עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> in a book מִפִּ֣י <WH6310> at the mouth יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> of Jeremiah בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year הָֽרְבִעִ֔ית <WH7243> in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֧ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֛הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying ס
כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> unto בָּרֽוּךְ׃ <WH1263> unto thee O Baruch

אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <WH559> Thou didst say אֽוֹי־ <WH188> Woe נָ֣א <WH4994> Ah לִ֔י כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָסַ֧ף <WH3254> hath added יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> is me now for the LORD יָג֖וֹן <WH3015> grief עַל־ <WH5921> unto מַכְאֹבִ֑י <WH4341> to my sorrow יָגַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3021> I fainted בְּאַנְחָתִ֔י <WH585> in my sighing וּמְנוּחָ֖ה <WH4496> no rest לֹ֥א <WH3808> no מָצָֽאתִי׃ <WH4672> and I find ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus תֹּאמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus shalt thou say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto him The LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what בָּנִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1129> thus Behold [that] which I have built אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am הֹרֵ֔ס <WH2040> will I break down וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> and what נָטַ֖עְתִּי <WH5193> and that which I have planted אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am נֹתֵ֑שׁ <WH5428> I will pluck up וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> is the whole הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> even this whole land הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאַתָּ֛ה <WH859> are you תְּבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> And seekest לְךָ֥ גְדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> thou great things אַל־ <WH408> not תְּבַקֵּ֑שׁ <WH1245> for thyself? seek כִּ֡י <WH3588> for הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> I am going מֵבִ֨יא <WH935> [them] not for behold I will bring רָעָ֤ה <WH7451> evil עַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּשָׂר֙ <WH1320> upon all flesh נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> will I give לְךָ֤ אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַפְשְׁךָ֙ <WH5315> but thy life לְשָׁלָ֔ל <WH7998> unto thee for a prey עַ֥ל <WH5921> in כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּקֹמ֖וֹת <WH4725> in all places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after תֵּֽלֶךְ־ <WH1980> along שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it ס
